text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Chromo, Colorado |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = Town |motto = |pushpin_map =Colorado |pushpin_label_position =left |pushpin_map_caption =Location within the state of Colorado |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Archuleta County |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = |subdivision_type4 = |subdivision_name4 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = unincorporated town |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = |area_land_km2 = |timezone = MST |utc_offset = -7 |timezone_DST = MDT |utc_offset_DST = -6 |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 2220 |elevation_ft = 7283 |postal_code_type = ZIP Code |postal_code = 81128 }} Chromo is an unincorporated town and U.S. Post Office in Archuleta County, Colorado, United States. The Chromo Post Office has the ZIP Code 81128. ==Geography== Chromo is located at (37.036818,-106.843243). ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Colorado
title: Chromo, Colorado
